title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1626-1.8 - Relocation progress report
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1626-1.8 - Relocation progress report

State Regulations
A report listing each site or offsite tenant, both
residential and commercial, still in possession and stating the progress being
made in relocating each such tenant shall be prepared on a quarterly basis
until all buildings are vacated. This report shall be forwarded to the Bureau
of Management on the last day of January, April, July and

October. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1626-1.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
